Question.Subject: how long does it take for lockerz to sell out?
Question.Content: How long does it take for lockerz to get sold out im new to the site and i heard you can redeem you PTZ monthly but they sell out quick. Also can anyone gimme some proof or give a good explanation if this site is legit cause my parents dont like this kind of stuff
Question.ChosenAnswer: the last one lasted half an hour. I got Halo2 =] from there earlier. Check out youtube and type in lockerz unboxing tons of proof. email me for an invite.

Answer.Content: the last one lasted half an hour. I got Halo2 =] from there earlier. Check out youtube and type in lockerz unboxing tons of proof. email me for an invite.
